summary: When a hotelier attempts to fill the chronic vacancies at his castle by launching an advertising campaign that falsely portrays the property as haunted, two actual ghosts show up and end up falling for two guests.
cast: Peter O'Toole|Donal McCann|Mary Coughlan|Liz Smith|Tom Hickey|Tony Rohr|Hilary Reynolds|Isolde Cazelet|Little John Nee|Steve Guttenberg|Beverly D'Angelo|Jennifer Tilly|Peter Gallagher|Martin Ferrero|Connie Booth|Krista Hornish|Matthew Wright|Paul O'Sullivan|Daryl Hannah|Liam Neeson|Ray McAnally|Aim√©e Delamain|Ruby Buchanan|Preston Lockwood|Peter Hanly
title: El hotel de los fantasmas
